hadiths.text: This tradition has also been transmitted by Zuhair through a different chain of narrators, to the same effect. He said:When the menstruation begins, you should abandon prayer; when the period equal to its length of time passes, you should wash away the blood and pray

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ رَوَى أَنَّ الْحَيْضَةَ إِذَا أَدْبَرَتْ لاَ تَدَعُ الصَّلاَةَ
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Narrated That She Should Not Leave The Prayer After Her Menses Finish
